cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on July 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6823, Elizabeth Dole Home- and Community-Based Services for Veterans and Caregivers Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 35 (Friday, February 25, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. BROWNLEY:
H.R. 6823.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H1147]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Elizabeth Dole Home and Community Based Services for Veterans and Caregivers Act of 2022
